oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Orders
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Typed document on tissue. Memorandum to "the" officers (crossed through to say "All"). Signed by Capt. Robert N. Campbell. From Headquarters, 2nd Battalion, 44th Artillery (C.A.C). Pertains to success of operations and suggestions toward such. From folded items at back of diary of 1st Lt. Allen Phillip Francis, Btry. C, 44th Artillery, Coastal Artillery Corps.
